statements: DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE product_name = 'Product ABC';
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 500 AND sale_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%shoes%' AND sale_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
DELETE FROM sales_data_table WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM performance_data_table WHERE sales_amount < 1000);

DELETE FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND unit_price < 1000.00;
DELETE FROM sales_performance WHERE performance_rating < 4 AND sales_rep_id = 101;
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount < 1000);
DELETE FROM Products WHERE ProductCategory = 'Electronics' AND ProductPrice > 1000;
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE CustomerAddress LIKE '%California%';
